title: Galileo: the challenge of reason
creator_credit: Dennis Azzarella and Learning Corporation of America
brief_description: Examines the life of Galileo, humanist and founder of modern experimental science, who, because of his unorthodox belief, was brought to trial before the Inquisition in 1632. It establishes a contemporary theme in the confrontation between an individual and the Establishment.
